Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Tom \Tom\, n. The knave of trumps at gleek. [Obs.] [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Tom \Tom\, n. 1. A familiar contraction of {Thomas}, a proper name of a man. [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
2. The male of certain animals; -- often used adjectively or in composition; as, tom turkey, tomcat, etc. [Webster 1913 Suppl.]

Tom n 1: contemptuous name for a Black man who is abjectly servile and deferential to Whites [syn: {Uncle Tom}] 2: male cat [syn: {tomcat}] 3: male turkey [syn: {turkey cock}, {gobbler}, {tom turkey}]
